fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Energy and Climate Policies. Resource Efficiency Policies. Trade. Health and environmental policies.
organisation_name: INEOS Olefins and Polymers Europe (INEOS OPE)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: We are member of Petrochemichals Europe (under CEFICs umbrella), PlasticsEurope and national chemical associations and employers associations in countries where we have production units
goals__remit: We are Europe's largest olefin producer with four of Europe’s most highly integrated and differentiated crackers, based in France, Germany, Norway and the UK. We produce 5.5 million tonnes per annum of olefins and aromatics, and 3 million tonnes of polyolefins. From a broad technology base we are able to produce polymers which are specifically tailored to provide high value solutions to customers in our chosen market sectors.
